overview: Diego Gosmar is a manager and entrepreneur working mainly on the unified communication, collaboration and mobile applications. Diego is the co-Founder and marketing director of Xenialab, dynamic company in south Europe born in the Turin Technology Campus for Innovation in 2007 and growing on the international market along with the flagship application focused on contact center market. Diego has a degree in Telecommunication engineer and attended as executive entrepreneur the Los Angeles GAP program at the UCLA Anderson School of Management.
